career.name: Kuldip Oswal Hosiery Mills Pvt. Ltd.
career.title: Software Developer and Consultant
description: Designed and implemented an inventory management and fabric booking system using FastAPI (Python) with a PostgreSQL database, ensuring scalability and reliability.
Developed a Next.js front-end with JWT-based authentication, providing secure and seamless access for users.
Optimized the system’s user interface for non-technical staff, improving usability and adoption across the organization.

career.name: State Art Corp.
career.title: Data Migration Internship
description: Executed a two-week data migration project, implementing measures to ensure accessibility and data integrity throughout the process.
Enhanced database usability by adding multi-user access support, resulting in a 2x improvement in operational efficiency.

career.name: Chahat Accessories
career.title: Web Development Internship
description: Designed and revamped the company’s e-commerce platform, increasing customer retention by 3x through improved performance and user experience.
Implemented modern front-end development practices and optimized site architecture, driving a 5x increase in website traffic and strengthening the brand’s online presence.

career.name: Freelance
career.title: Video Editor
description: Edited and produced content that generated 75M+ impressions, leveraging industry trends to maximize reach and engagement.
Analyzed audience insights to optimize video structure and pacing, increasing average watch time by 3.5 minutes.
